skins.shipDescription: Ryuuhou-class light aircraft carrier C Ryuuhou.
skins.selfIntroduction: While I was able to set sail many times during my time both as a submarine tender and as a light carrier, in the end, I was unable to take even a single step away from port... No, nothing will happen if I just sit around like this. As I have stated many times, I, Ryuuhou, will bring you victory!
skins.acquisition: Remodeled Taigei-class Submarine Tender, Zuihou-class Light Carrier Ryuuhou, reporting for duty. I will strive to bring you victory, Commander! Yes, this time, I won't be held back by failures on my path to victory!
skins.login: You have kept me waiting... No, it's nothing. I can deal with this.
skins.details: I learned the power of submarines firsthand in that great war. While it's too late to turn back now, I can't help but wonder how I would be perceived if I hadn't been remodeled into an aircraft carrier.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Looking after submarines is really rough... Th-This is from personal experience, so please believe me!
skins.secretaryIdle2: It's in my personality to not care what humans may think about me. This is the attitude that us warships ought to have as warriors.
skins.secretaryIdle3: From time to time, I become envious of the standard carriers... If only... I could be as strong as them...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, are you able to fathom this majestic outfit that impeccably balances both beauty and dignity?

skins.shipDescription: Commander, everyone seems to be busy with end-of-year preparations. If there is anything I can do to help, please let me know.
skins.acquisition: Commander, everyone seems to be busy with end-of-year preparations. If there is anything I can do to help, please let me know.
skins.login: Good work, Commander. Please allow me to prepare the hamaya!
skins.details: I control my carrier-based planes with this charm... A carrier cannot fight a foe face-to-face after all. This katana is merely a last resort.
skins.secretaryIdle1: The thing about Junyou is... Well, Commander, if something's bothering you, you can consult me, you know?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Because I'm in Shigure's debt, I cook her some food from time to time. She's really a good girl, even if she doesn't always act like one.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, would you like to write an Ema? Even if your wishes don't get fulfilled, it's still great to just be able to write down your thoughts.
skins.secretaryTouch: Hehe... Commander, are you here to enjoy some sweet sake as well? Don't worry, you won't get drunk...
